name: Lucene 5.0.0 tutorial
tagline: A short tutorial for using lucene in version 5.0.0
body:
My short tutorial for Lucene 5.0.0 welcomes any comments.
[Please visit us if you like in our blog!](http://www.apt-solutions.de/lucene-5-0-0-quickstart-tutorial)
